steps.title: You make a donation
steps.description:
The cost of one first aid kit is $80.

This is the price of saving lives and preventing irreversible harm.

The kit is crucial in the "golden hour"—the first hour after injury, when quick medical help significantly increases survival chances.

steps.title: We order medkits
steps.description:
UNIONTAC works with trusted Ukrainian manufacturers.

Once we place the order, they quickly deliver the medical kits to us.

Our volunteers then handle the delivery.

steps.title: Medkits save lives
steps.description:
Our volunteers deliver these life-saving supplies without delay, despite the daily shelling and threats.

We ensure the kits reach people on the frontlines—civilians, medics, and defenders—providing exactly what they need to save lives.

steps.title: Continuous Support
steps.description:
Our dedicated team monitors the distribution and impact of each medical kit.

We maintain constant communication with field units to understand evolving needs.

This feedback helps us improve and adapt our support to maximize effectiveness.

medkit.title: How the first-aid kit works
medkit.description1: Our first-aid kit is designed for immediate response to trauma and emergency situations. Each component is carefully selected and arranged for quick access, allowing responders to provide critical care in the crucial first minutes after an injury. The kit includes essential items for controlling bleeding, managing airways, and treating various trauma conditions.
medkit.description2: The compact and durable design ensures that all life-saving equipment stays protected and organized. Color-coded sections and clear labeling make it easy to locate specific items under pressure, while the water-resistant exterior protects the contents in any environment. This kit meets international emergency medical standards and is regularly updated based on field experience and medical advances.

cta.title: They can't wait—act now
cta.paragraph1: Every day, Russia shells Ukrainians with all possible weapons: drones, artillery, bombs and rockets, bringing death to ordinary people—women and children.
cta.paragraph2: Those on the frontline are losing their lives to protect their families, homes, freedom, and justice.
cta.paragraph3: For over a year, Uniontac has been providing vital support to Ukraine—medkits that save lives in critical moments.
cta.paragraph4: One first aid kit can save two lives, increasing the chances of survival and allowing evacuation from the combat zone.

statistics.title: What we have done together
statistics.subtitle: War doesn't stop so we work daily.

description.text: Delivered medical supplies to the frontline faster than light.
We've delivered critical aid to 15 brigades, ensuring they have the medical supplies they need to save lives.

aboutUs.title: We are Sveta, Kira, and >100 volunteers
aboutUs.paragraph1: Our mission is to provide them with the necessary first aid kits so they can face the challenges of each day.
aboutUs.paragraph2: For the military, there are no weekends, holidays, or the possibility to "leave" the front. The enemy doesn't know the word "rest," and every day, our warriors stand at the forefront, at the cost of their health and lives.
aboutUs.paragraph3: Help now to support those who hold the front for us – each first aid kit becomes a symbol of gratitude and care for those who bear the burden of protecting our freedom.
